# WKWebExtension.Action

**Class**

An object that encapsulates the properties for an individual web extension action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class Action
```

## Overview

This class provides access to action properties, such as pop-up, icon, or title, with tab-specific values.

## Instance Properties

- **associatedTab**: The tab that this action is associated with, or `nil` if it’s the default action.
- **badgeText**: The badge text for the action.
- **hasUnreadBadgeText**: A Boolean value indicating whether the badge text is unread.
- **inspectionName**: The name shown when inspecting the pop-up web view.
- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value indicating whether the action is enabled.
- **label**: The localized display label for the action.
- **menuItems**: The menu items provided by the extension for this action.
- **popupPopover**: A popover that presents a web view loaded with the pop-up page for this action, or `nil` if no popup is specified.
- **popupViewController**: A view controller that presents a web view loaded with the pop-up page for this action, or `nil` if no popup is specified.
- **popupWebView**: A web view loaded with the pop-up page for this action, or `nil` if no pop-up is specified.
- **presentsPopup**: A Boolean value indicating whether the action has a pop-up.
- **webExtensionContext**: The extension context to which this action is related.

## Instance Methods

- **closePopup()**: Triggers the dismissal process of the pop-up.
- **icon(for:)**: Returns the action icon for the specified size.

## Classes

- **WKWebExtension.Command**: An object that encapsulates the properties for an individual web extension command.
- **WKWebExtension.DataRecord**: An object that represents a record of stored data for a specific web extension context.
- **WKWebExtension.MatchPattern**: An object that represents a way to specify groups of URLs.
- **WKWebExtension.MessagePort**: An object that manages message-based communication with a web extension.
- **WKWebExtension.TabConfiguration**: An object that encapsulates configuration options for a tab in an extension.
- **WKWebExtension.WindowConfiguration**: An object that encapsulates configuration options for a window in an extension.
- **WKWebExtensionController.Configuration**: A [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionController/Configuration-swift.class] object with which to initialize a web extension controller.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
